location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 949 from Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, to David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 8 November 1834, Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, acknowledges the receipt of David Anderson Blane's letter, dated 6 May 1834, which contained a copy of correspondence with the Agent of the Wahabee [Wahhabi] Chief at Beymee regarding the tribe's relations with the British Government. Norris repeats that there is no policy for interference on the part of the British Government in the quarrels and concerns of the Arab tribes.
